testcase.name: Validate login successful scenarios
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to Gurukula home page......................................passed And I click on link to Login page...........................................passed And I enter username as "admin".............................................passed And I enter password as "admin".............................................passed When I click on login button................................................passed Then I verify user has logged in............................................passed And I validate the username displayed is "admin"............................passed Then I click on Logout option from Account dropdown.........................passed And I close the browser.....................................................passed

testcase.name: Validate login unsuccessful scenarios
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to Gurukula home page......................................passed And I click on link to Login page...........................................passed And I enter username as "admin".............................................passed And I enter password as "notadmin"..........................................passed When I click on login button................................................passed Then I validate Login failure...............................................passed And I close the browser.....................................................passed
